data.name: Oriental Sword
data.detailed_description:
Be a young sword man who aims to save the world.
However, difficulties ahead. Defeat your opponents and reveal the secret of evil WU JI XIANG.

TURN-BASED STRATEGIC COMBAT
Play with the Trick of Three Elements (RED counters GREEN, GREEN counters BLUE, BLUE counters RED). Predict opponent's elements and arrange tactic accordingly, use your brain to win the fight.



INTENSE COMBAT PERFORMANCE
This is not an action game, however, we have fluent and intense combat performance.



MEET CHAMPIONS
Champions are those who are famous for their combat skills. Hundreds of champions in this world, some of them will be your opponents in the game. Each of them has unique combat style and narrative backgrounds. Fight them, learn them then defeat them.



BUILD YOUR STYLE
Loot tons of weapons and relics from combats. Each of them has unique set of perks helping to ship your own combat style.



BE A PART OF JIANG HU
The place where has people full of stories called JIANG HU. Explore the world, meet people, learn their stories.

data.short_description: Be a young sword man to explore and save the world. A turn-based WuXia RPG game with strategic combat system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 /System10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
